elements.title: the Four Seasons Restaurant (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Julian Niccolini of the Four Seasons Restaurant (pictured) deliberately sat ex-partners next to each other?

elements.title: Vlado Milunić (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Vlado Milunić admitted that the Dancing House, which he co-designed, was compared to a "gold tooth that spoils a smile"?

elements.title: upcoming Grand Theft Auto game (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the leak of the upcoming Grand Theft Auto game was described as one of the biggest leaks in video game history?

elements.title: Denis Mann (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Scottish glass artist Denis Mann has made the winner's trophy for every series of the British game show Mastermind, which started in 1972?

elements.title: Nederlander Theatre (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that fans of the musical Rent would sleep outside the Nederlander Theatre to get cheap front-row tickets?

elements.title: Goldfish (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after a trip to Morocco in 1912, Henri Matisse painted Goldfish and the animal would become a frequent motif in his art over the next decade?

elements.title: Walter McCredie (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1915, Walter McCredie unsuccessfully challenged the baseball color line that prohibited non-white players?

elements.title: Cryptodidymosphaerites (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Cryptodidymosphaerites is a parasite of a parasite?
